name: Mindwave
storyline:
Pandora finds herself entering Mindscape Tower to take on the opportunity of a lifetime. The first of her opponents is a girl with a vibrant and bubbly personality, and whose mindspace is completely entirely with glitter, bright colors, and everything adorable.

They're one-on-one in a game of MINDWAVE: the world's most played cognitive reality game where players connect and experience each others' minds in an unfiltered onslaught of feelings and memories.

Can Pandora handle her first opponent's overwhelming mind and come out on top?
summary: Make your way to the top of Mindscape Tower and delve into the minds of your opponents in a cerebral microgame frenzy!
